name: Space Invaders (itch) (Xiphereal)
description:
Hello everyone! This is the result of a side project I started in February 2019, which consisted in learning both Python and Pygame through out the recreation of 'Space Invaders'.  

The source code is available here: https://github.com/Xiphereal/Space-Invaders

Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys

Shooting: Space bar

Quit the game: ESC

Available platforms:

 Linux & Windows (soon)

Linux instructions:

-Open terminal

-In game folder, type:  ./SpaceInvaders

Windows instructions:

-Click on SpaceInvaders.exe

DISCLAIMER: Neither SFX, sprites, mechanics, design or ideas are my own, they all belongs to Taito (1978).
